summary.p: Creates a grayscale version of an image that appears as though it has been stamped into paper.

p.i: This effect is new in the Universal Windows Platform. It is not supported on Windows 8.1 or Phone 8.1.
Supported by Win2D but not Windows.UI.Composition.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Emboss effect.
